column4: does anyone know how i can enable my artheros based wifi card on a new insall?
try sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)   in case its not already installed
when you say unname r u mean exaxtly as you said it or, do i need to put something in that area?
yeah just cut and paste that  $() or `` designates a command  uname -r if you type it by instelf in term will show you what it puts there
